headline.main: DULLES SAYS WE LACK VITAL FAITH IN WAR; Churches Peace Chairman Calls on Wallace and Welles

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, July 31 -- John F. Dulles of New York City, chairman of the Federal Council of Churches commission to study the basis for a just and durable peace, conferred today with Vice President Wallace and Sumner Welles, Under-Secretary of State. after his return from a visit of four weeks in England.
